name: Lin Lin
description:
A pretty rough demo which only provides Chinese subtitle at this moment.

"I", as the protagonist and freelance illustrator who is working hard everyday. "I" am not passion with getting in touch to the community.  Therefore "I" choose to stay at home to avoid any socializing and dispute. One night, "I" find out that some noise came from the neighbor's home again, Room F,  as usual. While this time there are girl crying. "I" am so curious what going on. So "I" use my superpower to see what happen in next door. What "I" see would be a huge surprise, and also heartbreaking.......
